timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-11T09:02:19", "sender_email": "aileensamillano@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Your Enquiry In London!", "message": "Hello Rishabh,\\n\\nI haven't received an offer yet. What the guarantor documents that need to sign? My guarantor hasn't received a confirmation email either.\\n\\nKind regards,\\n\\nAileen\\n\\nOn Mon, 11 Aug 2025 at 16:22, <[rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Aileen,\\n\\nHope you're doing well!\\n\\nI'm Rishabh, your Booking Manager at Amber. Thanks for choosing Amber for your student accommodation in London - excited to assist you!\\n\\nHere\u2019s what\u2019s next to complete your booking:\\n\\n- An offer has been sent to your email - please sign it to secure your accommodation.\\n- If a guarantor is required, they\u2019ll receive a confirmation email. Please remind them to upload their documents and sign the contract.\\n\\nOnce done, share the payment receipt so we can confirm everything with the property.\\nNeed help? Just reply to this email or WhatsApp me anytime.\\nI\u2019m happy to assist!\\n\\nThanks again for choosing Amber!\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hello Rishabh, I haven't received an offer yet. What the guarantor documents that need to sign? My guarantor hasn't received a confirmation email either. Kind regards, Aileen On Mon, 11 Aug", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "aileensamillano@gmail.com"}
